about_the_game:
A cargo full of 99 Pixel cats crashed on Venus. Abort your asteroids mining mission. Your priority is now to rescue the cats.
Dig your way down into the puzzling underground caves of an old hazardous industrial planet abounding in marvellous gems, plunge into the darkness and save the mysterious 99 pixel cats.









Carefully shape your environnement with your legendary jackhammer, and a bit of TNT. But the more you dig, the more you produce dust, so you better think twice before ending up in the dark...

Features:
-Dig. Dash. Detonate.
-Your grappel is your best friend.
-Each time your dig, you produce some nasty dust that will restrain your vision.
-Solve tricky puzzles.

name: 99 Pixel Cats Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2050
